text: Caldas de São Jorge is a former civil parish in the municipality of Santa Maria da Feira, Portugal. In 2013, the parish merged into the new parish Caldas de São Jorge e Pigeiros. It has a population of 2,728 inhabitants and a total area of 4.70 km². The major attraction of the town is the spa and its hotel. ==References== ==External links== *Information concerning the spa Category:Former parishes of Santa Maria da Feira
title: Caldas de São Jorge
